IPL98 Type enumerations and definitions (global)
[IPL98 Global C and C++ enums, definitions, structs etc.]

Basic definitions used in all parts of IPL98 These are generic types and in case of a given bit-size must comply with the given size of each type. More...


Modules

IPL98 Abstract types (global)
IPL98 Value types (global)
 Must comply with the given size of each type.

IPL98 Bool, true and false for C only
 The type bool (integer) is only defined when IPL98 is used as an ANSI C only library.

Detailed Description

Basic definitions used in all parts of IPL98 These are generic types and in case of a given bit-size must comply with the given size of each type.
